One day when she met Mrs White, she asked her why she never  _   my mistakes, and why she never31 pointed out  spelling or grammatical mistakes. I think that  _  Mrs White had used her red pen more, I  _  wouldn't be telling you about that now. I  look back  now and think she must have been a rather  _  teacher. I used to misspell "beautiful" a lot. Never could I quite remember that the "e" goes39 _ the "a", which made my teacher in high school upset. However, I could put the "e" and "a" into   _  right places in the end. And thanks to Mrs White, I could express what I meant even if I couldn't quite spell it out.
